name: Cloudcleave Radiance

desc.0: From innocence to maturity, from confusion to resolve.
desc.1: The long path ahead stretches on, and she grips her sword and presses forward, walking a path untrodden.
desc.2: Until her blade flashes like a soaring swan, illuminating the clouds above.
desc.4: <ct color=#959595>"Whenever I swing my sword, it grows warm... It's comforting." â€”Ye Shunguang</ct>

desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: The world may change, but my heart remains constant, like clouds standing eternal.
phaseDescs: The equipper's DMG ignores <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct> of the target's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</ct>. When the equipper activates an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</ct>, the equipper's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>25%</ct> and CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>25%</ct> for 40s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

The equipper's DMG ignores <ct color=#2BAD00>22%</ct> of the target's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</ct>. When the equipper activates an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</ct>, the equipper's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>28.7%</ct> and CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>28.7%</ct> for 40s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

The equipper's DMG ignores <ct color=#2BAD00>24%</ct> of the target's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</ct>. When the equipper activates an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</ct>, the equipper's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>32.5%</ct> and CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>32.5%</ct> for 40s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

The equipper's DMG ignores <ct color=#2BAD00>26%</ct> of the target's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</ct>. When the equipper activates an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</ct>, the equipper's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>36.2%</ct> and CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>36.2%</ct> for 40s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

The equipper's DMG ignores <ct color=#2BAD00>28%</ct> of the target's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</ct>. When the equipper activates an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</ct>, the equipper's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>40%</ct> and CRIT DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>40%</ct> for 40s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
